full_summary:
### 2BP3-143717 - Large Format Plotter for the Department of National Defence
Tender Reference: SSC-23-00023326:T


Contract Information:
* Publication Date: 2023-07-20
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-08-10T14:00:00
* Amendment Date: 2023-08-01
* Expected Contract Start Date: Not Applicable
* Expected Contract End Date: Not Applicable
* Tender Status: Expired


Purchase Description:
The Department of National Defence invites proposals for the supply, delivery, and installation of a large format plotter with a 5-year onsite warranty. The Contract includes the provision of necessary training to enable users to access all required features of the plotter.


Contract Specifications:
The plotter shall meet the following specifications:
* Large format (Detailed specifications available upon request)
* 5-year onsite warranty
* Installation and training in English


Delivery and Installation:
The plotter shall be delivered and installed at the Department of National Defence facility in Alberta, Canada.


Inquiries and Submissions:
For any inquiries or to submit a proposal, please contact:
Jesse Squirrell
Shared Services Canada
400 Cooper St
Ottawa, ON K2P 2H8
Phone: 613-791-6257
Email: [jesse.squirrell@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:jesse.squirrell@ssc-spc.gc.ca)

---
